name: Planet Harvest (Kobi Studios)
description:
Planet Harvest is a Casual, Idle Clicker about mining up planets for their junk and selling it for money! Explore through multiple different planets to gather space junk, sell them for money, and invest back into upgrades to become the best planet miner!

Features
  • Many Planets
  • Upgrades
  • Artefacts
  • Levelling
  • RNG Finds 
  • Supply Boxes

And More To Come!

Play on Android!
